author: adityapatwardhan
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Execute tests from PowerShell\test\powershell\engine\HelpSystem.Tests.ps1
## Expected behavior

All tests pass
## Actual behavior

2 tests fail
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.10-119-g26c7321074f6ad662eada05444ae42578c7bf130
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
CLRVersion
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Add RequireAdminOnWindows tag would solve the problem.

title: Help tests for Get-PSSessionCapability and New-PSRoleCapabilityFile fail as no description is found
